snoopy.blindnote: 28S:A4166とありますが、4166の位置はGです。一番近いAだと、28S:A4162です。boxD'から数えると28S:G4166が正解かもしれない。吉浜：28S:G4166に変更しました。 2009年6月19日（山元）snoRNABaseより。 Homo sapiens C/D box snoRNA U31. This snoRNA was initially characterized as a conserved intronic sequence in the U22 host gene, UGH. Other introns of the same gene host the C/D box snoRNAs U26-U30 (Tycowski, Shu and Steitz, 1996). U31 was postulated to guide the 2'O-ribose methylation of 28S rRNA G4166 by Kiss-Laszlo et al. (1996), although this methylated base was not mapped by Maden (1990). (20100701末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss-Laszlo, Z., Henry, Y., Bachellerie, J. P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1996). Site-specific ribose methylation of preribosomal RNA: a novel function for small nucleolar RNAs. Cell, 85, 1077-1088. Tycowski, K. T., Shu, M. D., and Steitz, J. A. (1996). A mammalian gene with introns instead of exons generating stable RNA products. Nature, 379, 464-466. Maden, B. E. (1990). The numerous modified nucleotides in eukaryotic ribosomal RNA. Prog Nucleic Acid Res Mol Biol, 39, 241-303.
